prev.excerpt: Let me present a stub for docpad-run project with bem-built static assets. If you ever wanted to be a generic blog holder equiped with nice and neat static files, here we go.

frontmatter.title: Docpad with the taste of BEM

next.excerpt:
My first task for new projects is to create a git repository. Whether it is a new app, or conference slides, or even an article, I prefer to keep everything in Git. It is an excellent tool, and, personally, I enjoy its command line interface.

However, there is always room for improvement. Recently I found an idea how to make my git visualize the changes that Iâ€™ve done to the images in a repository.

frontmatter.title: Visual diffs for the images in a git repo
